metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11813 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
libjpeg 9c has a large loop because read_pixel in rdtarga.c mishandles EOF.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
libjpeg-turbo-test - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
libjpeg-turbo8 - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
libturbojpeg - 2.1.2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

libjpeg-progs - 1:9d-1
libjpeg9 - 1:9d-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.2-0ubuntu1').
libjpeg6b package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
libjpeg9 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9d-1').
